description:
Now with 99 items!

Turn a boring photo into a fun and wacky laugh riot.  Take a picture and transform it by adding funny items such as wacky hats, beards, glasses, and many more.  You can take a new picture directly from Camera Fun! or open and edit an existing picture in your photo album.  At this moment, saving photos is done by taking a screenshot.  This the number one priority for future updates and we are working hard to implement this natively.  Many new features will be added through free updates.

UPDATES:
New in version 2.0

#1.  Now with 99 items! Choose from funny hats, wild glasses, weird beards, cute hearts and rainbows, goofy masks, cute animals, cool tatoos, awesome anime hair, and raunchy items like adult diapers and peed pants.
#2.  New landscape mode! Edit your wide shot photos full screen.  All tools and items rotate with cool animations.
#3.  Awesome scrolling toolbar; holding 99 items in 9 different categories.
#4.  New item tracking box.  Every item you place has a "grab box" which helps you position your item. 
#5.  Complete overhaul of item tracking.  Enjoy more precise placement and no more "frozen" items.
#6.  Better rotation and scaling of items.
#7.  Improvements to the help section.
